name: Instagram
desc: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

values.basic: to read a user’s profile info and media
values.public_content: to read any public profile info and media on a user’s behalf
values.follower_list: to read the list of followers and followed-by users
values.comments: to create or delete comments on a user’s behalf
values.relationships: to follow and unfollow accounts on a user’s behalf
values.likes: to like and unlike media on a user’s behalf
